sentence.Network_en: It is not easy to traduce his character.
sentence.Network_cn: 要中伤他的人格并非易事.

traduce 诽谤traducer 诽谤者traffic 交通

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (in the sense 'transport, transmit'): from Latin traducere 'lead in front of others, expose to ridicule', from trans- 'over, across' + ducere 'to lead'

entry.def: If someone has been traduced, unpleasant and untrue things have deliberately been said about them.

example.ex: We have been traduced in the press as xenophobic bigots.
example.tran: 我们被新闻界诋毁为仇外的偏狭之徒。

auth_sentence.content: I took that to mean that his father's life had a completeness of its own, which it was not the son's place to traduce.
auth_sentence.res_content: I took that to mean that his father's life had a completeness of its own, which it was not the son's place to traduce.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I took that to mean that his father's life had a completeness of its own, which it was not the son's place to traduce.

auth_sentence.content: Sin dudas, hay muchos motivos por los que una cultura del ahorro como la de Vietnam no se traduce en otros lugares.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Sin dudas, hay muchos motivos por los que una cultura del ahorro como la de Vietnam no se traduce en otros lugares.
